alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 24 at 8:51AM PDT until March 25 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 possible. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County
